channel.title: WSTR's "THE HOP STEW MIXSHOW"
channel.description: The Essence of Boom Bap Hip Hop Music!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: WSTR's Hop Stew Mix Show
channel.itunes:summary: The Essence of Boom Bap Hip Hop Music!

item.title: Episode #35 We are Back peeps! Sorry for the long delay.. Miss AZ & I are returning after a extremely long hiatus to bring you dope underground Hip Hop. Thanks for all of your support and we will see you in a couple of weeks with a brand new Hop Stew Mix
item.description:
PlayList:
1.) Exhale (The Wait Is Over!) - Leo Confident 2.) Green Butter - Remix (feat. Dr. Oop & Rouge Venom) - Ac The PD 3.) Low and Behold prod. Leo Confident - Open Minded w/kutz by Dj Rasta Roots 4.) Problems - Thaione Davis 5.) Detroit State Of Mind - Elzhi 6.) Krylon/Colors (Feat. Tristate) - Montage One 7.) Drugs Outside Remix (Feat. Black Milk, Rapper Pooh & Dj Romes) - Oddisee 8.) Heeey f/El Da Sensei, John Robinson, LeFortheUncool & Afaliah - J Rawls 9.) There will be blood (Feat. Sadat X ,Grand Puba, A.G, OC & Diamond D) - Celph Titled & Buckwild 10.) The Bridge (Feat. Promise) - Marco Polo 11.) Righteous Way - Edo G. 12.) Jazzmataz (Feat. Tone Treasure) - Jay Electronica 13.) Monetary Policy (Feat. Roc Marciano) - Beneficence 14.) The Greatest Story Never Told - Saigon 15.) Sound Off (Feat. Termanolgy & Easy Money) - OhNo 16.) illcandescent - Versis 17.) Social Light Shit - Arablak w/kutz by Amdex 18.) Buck & The Preacher - Melaphyre & Leo Goetz 19.) Calculations (Feat. Oddy Gato) - J-Live 20.) Lost Innocence (Feat. Lyric Jones) - Clan Destined 21.) Eyes Open Fist Clinche - Mikeflo & XTREME 22.) One Bad Day - Judah & Secret 23.) Still Standing (Feat. Jill Scott) - Pharoahe Monch 24.) Achilles Heal - Phife Dawg 25.) Quartz (Feat. Ogechi Chieke) - Declaime 26.) 4eva T.R.O.Y (Inst.) - Floyd The Locsmif

item.title: WSTR's Hop Stew Mixshow goes LIVE!!! on WRFG 89.3fm (SAT 10/9)
item.description:
Hop Stew Mixshow's first LIVE radio spot at a station here in Atlanta WRFG 89.3 fm last Sat 10/9 we had fun!! our fam @Arablak co hosted with me a dope mc who's been apart of our show from the beginning! with @dugboogie on the wheels it was a great show!! shout out to everyone who called in and showed love like we said we've been doing this for 3 years now and glad it reached the masses!! shout out to JayForce who let us come in and have the 2 hour slot!!! @missazatl
NEW SHOW NEXT WEEKEND!!!!!!
Ekundayo- ekundayo! Arablak- art life Punchline feat StaHHr & Homeboy Sandman- problem solved The Lyricists- come on Big Remo- go Jay Electronica- hard to get ID 4 Windz- now why city Kool G Rap- sad Raekwon- travel plans Diamond District- in the ruff Dynas- challenges of love Ozzy Reigns feat StaHHr & DT from Clan Destined- get up hi J Dilla- wont do Skyzoo & Torae- click MF Doom- air (astronote remix) DTMD- champion J-Live- the way that i rhyme Marco Polo feat Masta Ace- nostalgia Methuzulah feat Atlanta Posse Gangstarr Tribute- the kumite Illa J- we here J Rawls, Count Bass, Senor Kaos, John Robinson, H2O, Flux, Eddie Meeks-one song OC- far from yours Edo G- too much to live fo' Actual Proof- genius Dillion, P Locke, Akrobatik & Willie Evans Jr.- shake MOP- foundation Group Home- suspended in time Mos Def- untitled track Murs- murray's revenge Derrick Buck- aww bebe

item.title: WSTR's Hop Stew Mixshow June 5 episode #34
item.description:
BRAND NEW MIX!!! i love this episode a lot of dope tracks all squeezed in about an hour!!! dont forget we love hearing your music and drops you can send them to hopstewmixshow@gmail.com also if you want certain shows tracked out so you can go song to song send what shows to our gmail and make it attn: miss az!!!! follow us on twitter www.twitter.com/dugboogie & www.twitter.com/missazatl enjoy...
The Emotions- we go through changes The Sound Bwoi Killaz- anyone whoever loved Da Grassroots- black dove Skyzoo- lyrically inclined Def Squad- say word Fundamental- float (instru) Ill Bill- u.b.s (unauthorized biography of slayer) L Da Headtoucha- its’s your life Presto feat Blu- pour another glass Black Star- re:definition Mr. Malchau- why u living? Supastition- fountain of youth (slopfunkdust remix) 7L & Esoteric- learn from the druid Dj KO feat Wordsworth, Sticklin & Torae- that knack Dela feat Surreal & J-Live- the city Jax- the moment Black Milk feat Pharoahe Monch, Sean Price & Dj Premier- the matrix Dana Dane- nightmares Jax feat Kaos- for the cream (remix) Taybot feat Praxis- the fresco Clever Jeff- the birth Pete Rock & C.L.Smooth- mecca & the soul (loop) Run DMC- down with the king Binkis Recs- back to basics Ta’raach- yeah! J Dilla- fuck the police Organized Konfusion- let’s organize Johnny Madure feat The Other & J-Swan- blow up the spot *break- Taybot- Firestarter Interlude

item.title: WSTR's Hop Stew Mixshow May 29 episode #33
item.description:
We're back with a brand new mix episode #33!!!! please enjoy this brand new mix!!! and have seconds of episode #31 and episode #32!!! peace!!! next Sat 8pm est episode #34
Punchline feat StaHHr & Homeboy Sandman- problem solved The Lyricists- come on Pharcyde- ya mama LateBloomers- talkin’ talkin’ Fresh Daily- video gamin’ Asylum 7 feat Magestik Legend- hold your weight Heltah Skeltah- dr. wiggy Dynas- the apartment Eternia & MoSS feat Joell Ortiz- it’s funny Black Sheep feat Q-tip, Dave & Mike Gee- birds of a feather MF Doom- air (astronote remix) Epsilon Project- inspiration Stone Detectives feat Bahamadia- yokoso Lootpack feat Kazi, God’s Gift, Declaime, Oh No & Medaphoar- episodes Dj K.O. feat East- on & on Guru (R.I.P)- mass communication (stew flavored mix) Hieroglyphics- no nuts Massinfluence- morning breath chasers DTMD- you Gabriel Teodros- find a place * outro Chief- Love Castel

item.title: WSTR's Hop Stew Mixshow May 22 episode #32
item.description:
Once again back with our weekly mix thanx again to everyone who tunes in!!!! send your dope music and drops to hopstewmixshow@gmail.com check us out on twitter too!!! @dugboogie & @missazatl enjoy have seconds!! check out episode #31 if havent yet also!!! peace : )
*intro- Jon Kabet-Zinn- mindfulness of sounds and thoughts EPMD vs Jazz Liberatorz- strictly jazz biz (stew flavored mix) K.Sparks & Pajozo- microphone fiend Diamond District- streets wont let me chill De La Soul vs Wu Tang Clan- 7th chamber (stew flavored mix) Fashawn- the ecology Mc Rane- spur disean groove Donqui Shot- fur ewig und 3 tage pt 1 Tumi feat KG from Morafe- bophelo bame John Robinson- i am not for sale Sadat X- teach the children Gift of Gab- to know you Just-Ice- lyric licking BDP- t’cha t’cha Aarophat & Illastrate feat DOLO- whatchagannado Reflection Eternal feat RES- back again Poor Righteous Teachers- style dropped lessons taught Main Source feat Neek the Exotic- fakin’ the funk (remix) Special Ed- ready 2 attack Pete Rock & C.L. Smooth- go with the flow Nice & Smooth- return of the hip hop freaks Big Daddy Kane- set it off *outro- Apathy- Hard Times On Planet Earth

item.title: WSTR's Hop Stew Mixshow May 15 episode #31
item.description:
WERE BACK!!!!!! with a brand new mix to kick off the "Hop Stew Mixshow" being back and in full effect now you can eat with us every Sat at 8pm est to celebrate us being back!!!! please enjoy this mix and have seconds dont forget for those in Atlanta Dug Boogie has a new residency at Cloud IX restaurant & lounge 177 Peters St every thurs, fri and sat night!! Then tues at Apache Cafe hope to see you there!!! send us your tracks and drops to hopstewmixshow@gmail.com and check us out on Twitter @dugboogie & @missazatl !!!!!
yU feat Slimkat78 & Isabella Banneker- close G.R.E.A.T SCOTT- challenge at the house of ill repute Selema aka Diana Princess- #1 Dj Grandman feat Senor Kaos, 4-Ize & Boog Brown- the real atl Little Brother- tigallo for dolo DTMD- fantastic Dirtee Curt feat Leaf Erikson- same difference Grand Agent feat Planet Asia- it’s only right Bodega Man- paycheck Black Milk feat Nametag- tell ‘em Shadez of Brooklyn- drama Small Eyez feat Antonio Dye- soul incredible (sol remix) Opio- Vice Versa Randy Mason- like this Butta Verses feat Joell Ortiz- rock mic Finale- Saturday Society- yes ‘n’ deed Those Chosen- out the box Methuzulah feat Atlanta Posse Gangstarr Salute- the kumite J-Live- the way that i rhyme *Outro- King E- Loving You
